sections.heading: Short title.
sections.text:
This Act may be cited as the
University of Illinois Facility Use Prohibition Act.

sections.heading: No trustee, official, instructor, or other employee of the
sections.text:
University of Illinois shall extend to any subversive, seditious, and
un-American organization, or to its representatives, the use of any
facilities of the University for the purpose of carrying on, advertising or
publicizing the activities of such organization.
